Question
========

When the null hypothesis at a significance level of 0.05 can be rejected, is

Answerlist
----------

* The probability 0.05 that the null hypothesis is TRUE
* The probability 0.95 that the alternative hypothesis is TRUE
* The P value less than or equal to 0.05

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The probability 0.05 that the null hypothesis is TRUE: Incorrect
* The probability 0.95 that the alternative hypothesis is TRUE: Incorrect
* The P-value less than or equal to 0.05: Correct
